creditline: Gift of funds from Mrs. Carolyn Groves
text: Mechanical and astrological times intermingle in this ambitious clock by Jean-Antoine Lépine, clockmaker to King Louis XVI of France. Its central face features the local time of Paris, surrounded by dials indicating the times of twelve cities around the world. The dial on the left tracks the sun’s position relative to the constellations of the zodiac, while on the right, times of sunrise and sunset for Paris are indicated by ascending and descending markers.
title: Clock
